characters: Driver of a white SUV, driver of a red sedan
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. A white SUV on the left side of the frame gradually moves closer to the self-driving vehicle, eventually cutting into the lane. A red sedan is seen overtaking the self-driving vehicle from the left side.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while a white SUV from the adjacent left lane cuts into its lane, causing the vehicle to decelerate slightly to avoid collision. The red sedan overtakes the self-driving vehicle from the left side, maintaining a safe distance.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white SUV, approximately 2 meters away, moving closer and cutting into the self-driving vehicles lane. 2) Left side: A red sedan, approximately 3 meters away, overtaking the self-driving vehicle.
